CustomField.description: Account Incremental ARR in USD rolled up from related Contract USD amounts - provides multi-currency Account reporting in USD regardless of individual Contract currencies (Text format for proper $ display)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Account Incremental ARR in USD calculated by summing Contract Incremental ARR USD amounts. Populated automatically via Flow/Apex rollup logic. Displays as $123,456.78 format.
CustomField.label: Incremental ARR (USD)
